statements: DELETE FROM Payroll_Taxes WHERE salary > 50000 AND state_tax < 1000;
DELETE FROM Payroll_Taxes WHERE employee_id = 123 AND federal_tax > 500
DELETE FROM Payroll_Taxes WHERE state_tax < 200 AND salary BETWEEN 50000 AND 70000
DELETE FROM payroll_employee WHERE salary > 50000 AND tax_rate < 0.25
DELETE FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 100 AND employee_salary < 50000;
DELETE FROM Employee WHERE salary < 50000 AND tax_rate > 15.00;
